name: EMDIMENSION
overview: EMDIMENSION TECHNOLOGIES is focused on pushing the boundary of cutting edge technologies. We differentiate ourselves in the market place by providing unmatched technical solution that adds business value to customers through a combination of smart, feasible, efficient and innovative designs. In EMDIMENSION we think ahead of the curve and deliver technological solutions that take advantage of device capabilities as well as conform to all user expectations. Our in-house R&D primarily focuses on developing revolutionary concepts in Wireless communication with technical solutions beyond current generation technologies.
